Posts.Content: Nov 10, 2013 11:23PM heartbroken08 wrote: hi I did have biopsy. It was benign I had no thickening at all In my uterus either. I don't have ovaries. My gynecologist Isn't concerned. So I guess if it happens again then maybe they will do surgery -?/ I asked gynecologist & he said we just don't do a hysterectomy unless you have to So I guess I'm ok with that - I'm at a teaching hospital that us very big in cancer research - guess I have to trust someone -
